description: This file is a Flutter application main entry point (.dart file), defining the main widget structure and app initialization.

classes.name: MyApp
classes.description: The root widget of the application, configuring theme and home page.

classes.name: MyHomePage
classes.description: A StatefulWidget that serves as the main screen, displaying a message indicating that the app is being generated.

classes.name: _MyHomePageState
classes.description: State class for MyHomePage controlling the UI construction.

methods.name: main
methods.description: The entry point of the application that initializes and runs the MyApp widget.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for MyApp and _MyHomePageState.
